did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Correspondence, memoranda, professional writings, and lectures.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Includes correspondence, memoranda, professional writings, and lectures concerning Professor Palmer's 27 years at the Cornell Law School, especially his work on the procedure and substance of legal interference in the medical field and issues concerning medical ethics.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Includes correspondence, memoranda, professional writings, and lectures concerning Professor Palmer's 27 years at the Cornell Law School, especially his work on the procedure and substance of legal interference in the medical field and issues concerning medical ethics.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Larry Palmer papers, #18-2-3249. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

scopecontent.p: Publications include but are not limited to: The Journal of Criminal Law and Criminology, The New Yorker, University of Pennsylvania Law Review, and the Georgetown Journal on Poverty Law and Policy.
